name: Lawn in Order
description:
Lawn in Order is our submission to Weekly Game Jam #97

Theme: Strange Garden

Lawn in Order is a game about managing a garden. You can place plants which have different effects on the garden grid and optimize the cash output they give. You have to be careful with moles and quick growing grass!

Authors: AndyB, ViktorRKraus,  dasPanjo & jvolonte

ViktorRKraus (Soundcloud)
